languages.text: "Начиная от "убей", "охраняй" и так далее, заканчивая комплексными протоколами для охраны и патрулирования — то есть комбинациями паттернов поведения, по которым кибермастиф действует в зависимости от ситуации. Иначе говоря, мне не всегда надо контролировать Глейто — он способен оценивать обстановку и реагировать самостоятельно".

"They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."
languages.original_text: "Начиная от "убей", "охраняй" и так далее, заканчивая комплексными протоколами для охраны и патрулирования — то есть комбинациями паттернов поведения, по которым кибермастиф действует в зависимости от ситуации. Иначе говоря, мне не всегда надо контролировать Глейто — он способен оценивать обстановку и реагировать самостоятельно".

traits.locale_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows based on the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."

languages.text: 「『殺せ』『警護しろ』といった基本的なものから、より複雑な警備・パトロール用のプロトコルまで多岐にわたります。プロトコルというのは、複数の行動パターンを組み合わせたもので、サイバーマスチフは状況に応じてそれを実行します。つまり、私が常にグライトを操作している必要はありません。彼自身が状況に合わせて判断し、行動できるのです」
languages.original_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."

traits.locale_text: 「『殺せ』『警護しろ』といった基本的なものから、より複雑な警備・パトロール用のプロトコルまで多岐にわたります。プロトコルというのは、複数の行動パターンを組み合わせたもので、サイバーマスチフは状況に応じてそれを実行します。つまり、私が常にグライトを操作している必要はありません。彼自身が状況に合わせて判断し、行動できるのです」

languages.text: "Das reicht von 'Töte' und 'Bewache' bis zu komplexeren Wach- und Patrouillenprotokollen. Ein Protokoll ist eine Kombination von Verhaltensmustern, das der Cyber-Mastiff in Anpassung an die aktuelle Situation befolgt. Mit anderen Worten, ich muss Glaito nicht ständig kontrollieren – er kann eigenständig auf die Umstände reagieren und sich anpassen."
languages.original_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."

traits.locale_text: "Das reicht von 'Töte' und 'Bewache' bis zu komplexeren Wach- und Patrouillenprotokollen. Ein Protokoll ist eine Kombination von Verhaltensmustern, das der Cyber-Mastiff in Anpassung an die aktuelle Situation befolgt. Mit anderen Worten, ich muss Glaito nicht ständig kontrollieren – er kann eigenständig auf die Umstände reagieren und sich anpassen."

languages.text: « Ses ordres connus vont des simples "tue" et "garde", aux protocoles de protection et de patrouille les plus complexes. Un protocole est une combinaison de comportements que le cyber-mastiff est tenu de suivre en fonction de la situation. Autrement dit, je ne contrôle pas Glaito de manière constante : il est capable d'adapter ses réactions en fonction des circonstances, de façon indépendante. »
languages.original_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."

traits.locale_text: « Ses ordres connus vont des simples "tue" et "garde", aux protocoles de protection et de patrouille les plus complexes. Un protocole est une combinaison de comportements que le cyber-mastiff est tenu de suivre en fonction de la situation. Autrement dit, je ne contrôle pas Glaito de manière constante : il est capable d'adapter ses réactions en fonction des circonstances, de façon indépendante. »

languages.text: «Pues van desde "mata", "protege" y otras similares, hasta órdenes más complejas y protocolos de patrulla. Un protocolo es una combinación de patrones de conducta que el cibermastín sigue en función de la situación actual. En otras palabras, no siempre tengo el control de Glaito; puede adaptarse y reaccionar al entorno por voluntad propia».
languages.original_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."

traits.locale_text: «Pues van desde "mata", "protege" y otras similares, hasta órdenes más complejas y protocolos de patrulla. Un protocolo es una combinación de patrones de conducta que el cibermastín sigue en función de la situación actual. En otras palabras, no siempre tengo el control de Glaito; puede adaptarse y reaccionar al entorno por voluntad propia».

languages.text: “这些命令的范围从‘杀戮’到‘守卫’不一而足。此外，它还懂得更加复杂的守卫、巡逻协议。协议可以理解成行为模式的组合，生化獒犬会根据当前的情况来执行特殊的命令。简单地说，我没必要一直对格雷托下命令，它可以根据当下环境自行调整、应对。”
languages.original_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."

traits.locale_text: “这些命令的范围从‘杀戮’到‘守卫’不一而足。此外，它还懂得更加复杂的守卫、巡逻协议。协议可以理解成行为模式的组合，生化獒犬会根据当前的情况来执行特殊的命令。简单地说，我没必要一直对格雷托下命令，它可以根据当下环境自行调整、应对。”

languages.text: "'Öldür' ve 'koru' gibi komutların yanı sıra daha karmaşık koruma ve devriye protokollerine sahiptir. Bir protokol, siber mastifin mevcut duruma göre takip ettiği davranış kalıplarının bir birleşimidir. Başka bir deyişle, Glaito'yu sürekli kontrol etmek zorunda değilim. Kendi başına da duruma uyum sağlayıp tepki verebilir."
languages.original_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."

traits.locale_text: "'Öldür' ve 'koru' gibi benzer komutlardan daha karmaşık koruma ve devriye protokollerine sahip. Bir protokol, siber mastifin mevcut duruma göre takip ettiği davranış kalıplarının bir birleşimidir. Başka bir deyişle, Glaito'yu sürekli kontrol etmek zorunda değilim. Kendi başına da duruma uyum sağlayabilir ve tepki verebilir."

languages.original_text: "They range from 'kill' and 'guard' and the like to more complex guard and patrol protocols. A protocol is a combination of behavioural patterns, which the cyber-mastiff follows according to the present situation. In other words, I don't have to control Glaito all the time — he can adjust and react to the circumstances on his own."
